title: Easter Island
creator_credit: Coleman Film Enterprises and Southwestern Educational Films
brief_description: Study of the land, the people and the strange history of Easter Island, a Pacific Island famous for its giant mysterious figures. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
